channel.title: Equinox 317 | Skilling & Pking | Bosses | NEW RELEASE!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/168eov8.jpg[/img]
[size=36pt]Pictures coming soon![/size] [size=24pt]This page needs lots of updating, will update soon with more information.[/size] [u][size=24pt]The Start[/size][/u] Equinox was created on August 2014 by Kryptic & Nytr1x. This is our very first release and we would like to see how it turns out. We dedicate lots of our time in this server to make it one of the best servers for you to enjoy.
[u][size=24pt]Server & Updates[/size][/u] We update the server frequently, our updates are based on mostly what people wants in the game. The server will be 24/7 next month, the reason that it isn't already is because we wanted to see if it goes well or not as it is.
[u][size=24pt]Community[/size][/u] So far there are only 2 people running the server but by time we will higher more people to work with us.
[u][size=24pt]Features[/size][/u] Working combat with all specials also working. Duel Arena Lots of bosses All Skills work Perfectly working prayers & Much more... [u][size=24pt]Dl Link[/size][/u] https://dl.dropbox.com/s/xsdkvrhqsbox5fk/Equinox.jar
[/CENTER] :D

item.title: Equinox 317 | Skilling & Pking | Bosses | NEW RELEASE!
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Your features list has nothing unique at all, and since you don’t provide pictures you give no reason for anyone to come and play the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Equinox 317 | Skilling & Pking | Bosses | NEW RELEASE!
item.dc:creator: @Blawan Blawan
item.description:
@Blawan wrote:

[CENTER]

[size=36pt]Pictures coming soon![/size]
[size=24pt]This page needs lots of updating, will update soon with more information.[/size]
[size=24pt]The Start[/size]
Equinox was created on August 2014 by Kryptic & Nytr1x.
This is our very first release and we would like to see how it turns out.
We dedicate lots of our time in this server to make it one of the best servers for you to enjoy.

[size=24pt]Server & Updates[/size]
We update the server frequently, our updates are based on mostly what people wants in the game.
The server will be 24/7 next month, the reason that it isn’t already is because we wanted to see if it goes well or not as it is.

[size=24pt]Community[/size]
So far there are only 2 people running the server but by time we will higher more people to work with us.

[size=24pt]Features[/size]
Working combat with all specials also working.
Duel Arena
Lots of bosses
All Skills work
Perfectly working prayers
& Much more…
[size=24pt]Dl Link[/size]
https://dl.dropbox.com/s/xsdkvrhqsbox5fk/Equinox.jar

[/CENTER]

Read full topic
item.source: Equinox 317 | Skilling & Pking | Bosses | NEW RELEASE!
